sentences.sContent: Free school lunches are given to children who qualify.
sentences.sCn: 符合条件的儿童可获得免费的学生午餐。

sentences.sContent: ...An estimated 10 million people in the UK, or 17% of the population, qualify for disability status under the DDA...

synos.tran: 限制；使具有资格；证明…合格

remMethod.val: qual(看作quality， 质量) ＋ ify(使…) → 质量过关 → (使)胜任， (使)合格

words.tran: 资格；条件；限制；赋予资格
限定词，[语] 限定语；取得资格的人；修饰语
限制（qualify的过去分词）；描述；授权予

trans.tranCn: 胜任， 具有资格， 合格； 限定
trans.tranOther: to have the right to have or do something, or to give someone this right
